name: Hotel Tokas
body:
## Welcome

Hotel Tokas is a restaurant which is situated in Neemrana, Rajasthan. Its a star hotel where quality foods are available. They also provide rooms for accommodation which would be well maintained and suitable for all. It is among the most highly rated economy hotel in the Neemrana city, and offers you an elaborate range of services and facilities even on a modest budget. 
***

## My Work

I have created a website for Hotel Tokas using **HTML, CSS, Javascript **and also some libraries like **Bootstrap and jquery**. 
I have not used any wix.com or wordpress.com or any other templates. I have done by myself using **Brackets** text editor. Though it seems simple, its my first website created by myself. I just learning web development part right now,so it would helped me lot to learn about website structure and styling of website using various css properties and so on. 
***

###_**About Hotel Tokas:**_
###                                            **"17 Years of experience!**
### 						**34 Team Members!**
### 						**12500 Customers served!**
### 						**75 Dishes!"**	
***

#### Tags
